name: Ten pages of hell
description:
Ten pages of hell is a 2d parkour game where you play as objects such as square hexagon or circle.The game is made really hard and has a deep meaning within it,the meaning is that life isnt easy everything we do will come back at us so we have to be patient and not think that life is easy.Thats the meaning of the game,if you have anger issues and you want to fix that try this game out!

Yes the game is hard but it is possible.
